channel.title: [PI] Client + Cache help
channel.description:
Today i was adding Models items, but in this time if i add more modles in Raw ( in my cache ) Look what i get when i open my client:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FmNH9gp.png[/img]
I must go back to "C:/mycache/Raw, - and remove the ID.dat to back the screen.
Any ideas, I want add more Models and i don't want to lose my client, how to fix ?

item.title: [PI] Client + Cache help
